% Survey HeroX
% Preliminary data analysis
% This version: \today

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
strnl <- function(x) {
	paste(strwrap(as.character(x),70), collapse="\n")
}

# Read data
read.csv("../Data/Survey/HeroX+Survey_April+13%2C+2017_21.22.csv") -> dat
questions <- unlist(droplevels(dat[1, ]))
questions.info <- dat[2, ]
survey <- subset(dat[-c(1,2), ], QID3!="")
for (i in 1:ncol(survey)) {
	if(is.factor(survey[, i])) {
		survey[,i] <- droplevels(survey[,i])
	}
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
respondents <- nrow(survey)
sprintf("Survey respondents=%i", respondents)
sprintf("%0.0f percent of target (target=150)", respondents/1.50 )
sprintf("%0.0f percent of respodents over solicited (solicited=3,154)", respondents/31.54)
```
